judges: Before Bell, C. J., Musmanno, Jones, Cohen, Eagen, O’Brien and Roberts, JJ.

opinions.text:
Opinion
Per Curiam,
Decree affirmed. Each party to pay own costs.
Mr. Justice Musmanno dissents.
opinions.author: Per Curiam,

attorneys: William J. Rockenstein, with him Clark H. Painter, for appellees.

Connelly Estate.

November 23, 1965:
